meanings: Things were different yesterday and things are different today
Things were different yesterday and things are different today

vlive.korean: 오늘 하루 어떠셨나요? How was your day? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Jeong Eun Ji X CouchTalk - 정은지 X 카우치토크
하루 이틀도 아니고 - 네 슈아 씨, 지금 어디신가요? You're not a rookie. - Joshua, where are you now? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 갑 겸 브
vlive.english: You're not a rookie. - Joshua, where are you now?

vlive.korean: 아니니까 뭐 - 버논 씨 오늘 뭐, 어떤 하루를 보냈습니까? But it's not. - Vernon, how was your day today? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 갑 겸 브
vlive.english: But it's not. - Vernon, how was your day today?

vlive.korean: 좋은 하루 되세요~ Have a good day. 듣기 View video WayV (威神V) : hihi~
오늘 하루 어떠냐고요? How was my day today? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 금겸🌼

examples.korean: We lazed by the pool all day. 발음듣기 우리는 하루 종일 수영장 가에서 느긋하게 보냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We lazed by the pool all day. 발음

examples.korean: My mood seems to fluctuate from day to day. 발음듣기 내 기분은 하루하루 변동을 보이는 것 같다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My mood seems to fluctuate from day to day. 발음

examples.korean: We laboured all day in the fields. 발음듣기 우리는 하루 종일 들판에서 노동을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We laboured all day in the fields. 발음

examples.korean: We spent the day punting on the river. 발음듣기 우리는 삿대젓는일로 하루를 다 써버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We spent the day punting on the river. 발음

examples.korean: The temperatures remained below freezing all day. 발음듣기 기온이 하루 종일 영하에 머물렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The temperatures remained below freezing all day. 발음
